name: 0-1601 new traditions
notes:
**knitted baubles in drops lima. the piece is worked in the round, bottom up, with nordic pattern. theme: christmas.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern li-171
yarn group b

-------------------------------------------------------


**size**:
circumference = 21 cm. diameter = 7 cm.

**yarn**:
drops lima from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group b)
100 g colour 0100, off white
100 g colour 3609, red

**accessories**:
wadding.

1 bauble weighs approx. 12 grams, without wadding.

**needles**:
drops double pointed needles size 3 mm.
drops crochet hook size 3 mm.

**knitting tension**:
23 stitches in width and 32 rows in height with stocking stitch and nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm.
note: needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
